description:
Reentrancy in BorrowSwap.InitBorrow(address,address,address,address,uint256,int256) (contracts/BorrowSwap.sol#57-86):
	External calls:
	- TransferHelper.safeTransferFrom(_tokenIn,msg.sender,address(this),_collateral_amount) (contracts/BorrowSwap.sol#66)
	- TransferHelper.safeApprove(_tokenIn,address(unilendCore),_collateral_amount) (contracts/BorrowSwap.sol#68)
	- unilendCore.borrow(_pool,_amount,_collateral_amount,address(msg.sender)) (contracts/BorrowSwap.sol#70)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Borrowed(_borrowToken,msg.sender,_amount,block.timestamp) (contracts/BorrowSwap.sol#80)
